info.title: Pactus APIs
info.description:
Every node in the Pactus network can be configured to expose HTTP-APIs for communication.
These APIs follow the [OpenAPI (Swagger)](https://swagger.io/specification/) specification, and a complete list of available endpoints can be found here.

## Units

All the amounts are in NanoPAC units, which are atomic and the smallest unit in the Pactus blockchain.
Each PAC is equivalent to 1,000,000,000 or 10<sup>9</sup> NanoPACs.

post.summary: PublicKeyAggregation aggregates multiple BLS public keys into a single key.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for aggregating multiple BLS public keys.

post.summary: SignMessageWithPrivateKey signs a message with the provided private key.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for signing a message with a private key.

post.summary: SignatureAggregation aggregates multiple BLS signatures into a single signature.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for aggregating multiple BLS signatures.

post.summary: VerifyMessage verifies a signature against the public key and message.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for verifying a message signature.

get.summary: GetAccount retrieves information about an account based on the provided address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address of the account to retrieve information for.

get.summary: GetBlock retrieves information about a block based on the provided request parameters.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the block to retrieve.

parameters.name: verbosity
parameters.description:
The verbosity level for block information.

 - BLOCK_VERBOSITY_DATA: Request only block data.
 - BLOCK_VERBOSITY_INFO: Request block information and transaction IDs.
 - BLOCK_VERBOSITY_TRANSACTIONS: Request block information and detailed transaction data.

get.summary: GetBlockHash retrieves the hash of a block at the specified height.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the block to retrieve the hash for.

get.summary: GetBlockHeight retrieves the height of a block with the specified hash.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: The hash of the block to retrieve the height for.

get.summary: GetBlockchainInfo retrieves general information about the blockchain.
GetConsensusInfo retrieves information about the consensus instances.
GetPublicKey retrieves the public key of an account based on the provided address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address for which to retrieve the public key.

get.summary: GetTxPoolContent retrieves current transactions in the transaction pool.

parameters.name: payloadType
parameters.description:
The type of transactions to retrieve from the transaction pool. 0 means all types.

 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified payload type.
 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_TRANSFER: Transfer payload type.
 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_BOND: Bond payload type.
 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_SORTITION: Sortition payload type.
 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_UNBOND: Unbond payload type.
 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_WITHDRAW: Withdraw payload type.
 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_BATCH_TRANSFER: Batch transfer payload type.

get.summary: GetValidator retrieves information about a validator based on the provided address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address of the validator to retrieve information for.

get.summary: GetValidatorByNumber retrieves information about a validator based on the provided number.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The unique number of the validator to retrieve information for.

get.summary: GetNetworkInfo retrieves information about the overall network.

parameters.name: onlyConnected
parameters.description: If true, returns only peers that are currently connected.

get.summary: GetNodeInfo retrieves information about a specific node in the network.
Ping provides a simple connectivity test and latency measurement.

post.summary: BroadcastTransaction broadcasts a signed transaction to the network.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for broadcasting a signed transaction to the network.

post.summary: CalculateFee calculates the transaction fee based on the specified amount and payload type.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for calculating transaction fee.

post.summary: DecodeRawTransaction accepts raw transaction and returns decoded transaction.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for decoding a raw transaction.

post.summary: GetRawBatchTransferTransaction retrieves raw details of batch transfer transaction.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for retrieving raw details of a batch transfer transaction.

post.summary: GetRawBondTransaction retrieves raw details of a bond transaction.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for retrieving raw details of a bond transaction.

post.summary: GetRawTransferTransaction retrieves raw details of a transfer transaction.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for retrieving raw details of a transfer transaction.

post.summary: GetRawUnbondTransaction retrieves raw details of an unbond transaction.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for retrieving raw details of an unbond transaction.

post.summary: GetRawWithdrawTransaction retrieves raw details of a withdraw transaction.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for retrieving raw details of a withdraw transaction.

get.summary: GetTransaction retrieves transaction details based on the provided request parameters.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the transaction to retrieve.

parameters.name: verbosity
parameters.description:
The verbosity level for transaction details.

 - TRANSACTION_VERBOSITY_DATA: Request transaction data only.
 - TRANSACTION_VERBOSITY_INFO: Request detailed transaction information.

get.summary: CreateWallet creates a new wallet with the specified parameters.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name for the new wallet.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password to secure the new wallet.

get.summary: GetAddressHistory retrieves the transaction history of an address.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet containing the address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to retrieve history for.

get.summary: GetAddressInfo returns detailed information about a specific address.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet containing the address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to query.

get.summary: GetNewAddress generates a new address for the specified wallet.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to generate a new address.

parameters.name: addressType
parameters.description:
The type of address to generate.

 - ADDRESS_TYPE_TREASURY: Treasury address type.
Should not be used to generate new addresses.
 - ADDRESS_TYPE_VALIDATOR: Validator address type used for validator nodes.
 - ADDRESS_TYPE_BLS_ACCOUNT: Account address type with BLS signature scheme.
 - ADDRESS_TYPE_ED25519_ACCOUNT: Account address type with Ed25519 signature scheme.
Note: Generating a new Ed25519 address requires the wallet password.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A label for the new address.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password for the new address. It's required when address_type is Ed25519 type.

get.summary: GetTotalBalance returns the total available balance of the wallet.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to get the total balance.

get.summary: GetTotalStake returns the total stake amount in the wallet.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to get the total stake.

get.summary: GetValidatorAddress retrieves the validator address associated with a public key.

parameters.name: publicKey
parameters.description: The public key of the validator.

get.summary: GetWalletInfo returns detailed information about a specific wallet.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to query.

get.summary: ListAddress returns all addresses in the specified wallet.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the queried wallet.

get.summary: ListWallet returns a list of all available wallets.
LoadWallet loads an existing wallet with the given name.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to load.

get.summary: RestoreWallet restores an existing wallet with the given mnemonic.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name for the restored wallet.

parameters.name: mnemonic
parameters.description: The mnemonic (seed phrase) for wallet recovery.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password to secure the restored wallet.

patch.summary: SetAddressLabel sets or updates the label for a given address.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet containing the address.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Wallet password required for modification.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to label.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: The new label for the address.

get.summary: SignMessage signs an arbitrary message using a wallet's private key.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to sign with.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Wallet password required for signing.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address whose private key should be used for signing the message.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The arbitrary message to be signed.

get.summary: SignRawTransaction signs a raw transaction for a specified wallet.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet used for signing.

parameters.name: rawTransaction
parameters.description: The raw transaction data to be signed.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Wallet password required for signing.

get.summary: UnloadWallet unloads a currently loaded wallet with the specified name.

parameters.name: walletName
parameters.description: The name of the wallet to unload.

data.description: The serialized data of the account.

number.description: The unique number assigned to the account.

balance.description: The balance of the account in NanoPAC.

pactusAccountInfo.description: Message contains information about an account.

publicKey.description: The public key associated with the address.

label.description: A human-readable label associated with the address.

path.description: The Hierarchical Deterministic (HD) path of the address within the wallet.

pactusAddressInfo.description: AddressInfo contains detailed information about a wallet address.

pactusAddressType.description:
AddressType defines different types of blockchain addresses.

 - ADDRESS_TYPE_TREASURY: Treasury address type.
Should not be used to generate new addresses.
 - ADDRESS_TYPE_VALIDATOR: Validator address type used for validator nodes.
 - ADDRESS_TYPE_BLS_ACCOUNT: Account address type with BLS signature scheme.
 - ADDRESS_TYPE_ED25519_ACCOUNT: Account address type with Ed25519 signature scheme.
Note: Generating a new Ed25519 address requires the wallet password.

prevBlockHash.description: The hash of the previous block.

stateRoot.description: The state root hash of the blockchain.

sortitionSeed.description: The sortition seed of the block.

proposerAddress.description: The address of the proposer of the block.

pactusBlockHeaderInfo.description: Message contains information about the header of a block.

pactusBlockVerbosity.description:
Enumeration for verbosity levels when requesting block information.

 - BLOCK_VERBOSITY_DATA: Request only block data.
 - BLOCK_VERBOSITY_INFO: Request block information and transaction IDs.
 - BLOCK_VERBOSITY_TRANSACTIONS: Request block information and detailed transaction data.

signedRawTransaction.description: The signed raw transaction data to be broadcasted.

pactusBroadcastTransactionRequest.description: Request message for broadcasting a signed transaction to the network.

id.description: The unique ID of the broadcasted transaction.

pactusBroadcastTransactionResponse.description: Response message contains the ID of the broadcasted transaction.

amount.description: The amount involved in the transaction, specified in NanoPAC.

fixedAmount.description: Indicates if the amount should be fixed and include the fee.

pactusCalculateFeeRequest.description: Request message for calculating transaction fee.

fee.description: The calculated transaction fee in NanoPAC.

pactusCalculateFeeResponse.description: Response message contains the calculated transaction fee.

committers.description: List of committers in the certificate.

absentees.description: List of absentees in the certificate.

pactusCertificateInfo.description: Message contains information about a certificate.

pactusConnectionInfo.description: ConnectionInfo contains information about the node's connections.

address.description: The address of the consensus instance.

active.description: Indicates whether the consensus instance is active and part of the committee.

height.description: The height of the consensus instance.

round.description: The round of the consensus instance.

votes.description: List of votes in the consensus instance.

pactusConsensusInfo.description: Message contains information about a consensus instance.

pactusCounterInfo.description: CounterInfo holds counter data regarding byte and bundle counts.

mnemonic.description: The mnemonic (seed phrase) for wallet recovery.

pactusCreateWalletResponse.description: Response message contains wallet recovery mnemonic (seed phrase).

rawTransaction.description: The raw transaction data in hexadecimal format.

pactusDecodeRawTransactionRequest.description: Request message for decoding a raw transaction.

pactusDecodeRawTransactionResponse.description: Response message contains the decoded transaction.

pactusDirection.description:
Direction represents the connection direction between peers.

 - DIRECTION_UNKNOWN: Unknown direction (default value).
 - DIRECTION_INBOUND: Inbound connection - peer connected to us.
 - DIRECTION_OUTBOUND: Outbound connection - we connected to peer.

historyInfo.description: List of all historical transactions associated with the address.

pactusGetAddressHistoryResponse.description: Response message contains address transaction history.

walletName.description: The name of the wallet containing the address.

publicKey.description: The public key of the address.

path.description: The Hierarchical Deterministic (HD) path of the address.

data.description: Block data, available only if verbosity level is set to BLOCK_VERBOSITY_DATA.

prevCert.description: Certificate information of the previous block.

txs.description:
List of transactions in the block, available when verbosity level is set to
BLOCK_VERBOSITY_TRANSACTIONS.

lastBlockHeight.description: The height of the last block in the blockchain.

lastBlockHash.description: The hash of the last block in the blockchain.

totalAccounts.description: The total number of accounts in the blockchain.

totalValidators.description: The total number of validators in the blockchain.

activeValidators.description: The number of active (not unbonded) validators in the blockchain.

totalPower.description: The total power of the blockchain.

isPruned.description: If the blocks are subject to pruning.

pruningHeight.title: Lowest-height block stored (only present if pruning is enabled)

lastBlockTime.title: Timestamp of the last block in Unix format

committeeProtocolVersions.description: Map of protocol versions and their percentages in the committee.

pactusGetBlockchainInfoResponse.description: Response message contains general blockchain information.

proposal.description: The proposal of the consensus info.

pactusGetNetworkInfoResponse.description: Response message contains information about the overall network.

walletName.description: The name of the wallet where address was generated.

addressInfo.description: Detailed information about the new address.

pactusGetNewAddressResponse.description: Response message contains newly generated address information.

moniker.description: Moniker or Human-readable name identifying this node in the network.

agent.description: Version and agent details of the node.

startedAt.description: Unix timestamp when the node was started (UTC).

services.description: Bitfield representing the services provided by the node.

servicesNames.description: Names of services provided by the node.

localAddrs.description: List of addresses associated with the node.

protocols.description: List of protocols supported by the node.

clockOffset.description: Offset between the node's clock and the network's clock (in seconds).

currentTime.description: Current Unix timestamp of the node (UTC).

pactusGetNodeInfoResponse.description: Response message contains information about a specific node in the network.

publicKey.description: The public key associated with the provided address.

pactusGetPublicKeyResponse.description: Response message contains public key information.

lockTime.description: The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block height.

recipients.description: The list of recipients with their amounts. Minimum 2 recipients required.

fee.description: The transaction fee in NanoPAC. If not set, it is set to the estimated fee.

memo.description: A memo string for the transaction.

pactusGetRawBatchTransferTransactionRequ.description: Request message for retrieving raw details of a batch transfer transaction.

lockTime.description: The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block height.

stake.description: The stake amount in NanoPAC. Must be greater than 0.

publicKey.description: The public key of the validator. Optional, but required when registering a new validator.

fee.description: The transaction fee in NanoPAC. If not set, it is set to the estimated fee.

memo.description: A memo string for the transaction.

pactusGetRawBondTransactionRequest.description: Request message for retrieving raw details of a bond transaction.

rawTransaction.description: The raw transaction data in hexadecimal format.

id.description: The unique ID of the transaction.

pactusGetRawTransactionResponse.description: Response message contains raw transaction data.

lockTime.description: The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block height.

amount.description: The amount to be transferred, specified in NanoPAC. Must be greater than 0.

fee.description: The transaction fee in NanoPAC. If not set, it is set to the estimated fee.

memo.description: A memo string for the transaction.

pactusGetRawTransferTransactionRequest.description: Request message for retrieving raw details of a transfer transaction.

lockTime.description: The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block height.

validatorAddress.description: The address of the validator to unbond from.

memo.description: A memo string for the transaction.

pactusGetRawUnbondTransactionRequest.description: Request message for retrieving raw details of an unbond transaction.

lockTime.description: The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block height.

validatorAddress.description: The address of the validator to withdraw from.

accountAddress.description: The address of the account to withdraw to.

amount.description: The withdrawal amount in NanoPAC. Must be greater than 0.

fee.description: The transaction fee in NanoPAC. If not set, it is set to the estimated fee.

memo.description: A memo string for the transaction.

pactusGetRawWithdrawTransactionRequest.description: Request message for retrieving raw details of a withdraw transaction.

walletName.description: The name of the queried wallet.

totalBalance.description: The total balance of the wallet in NanoPAC.

pactusGetTotalBalanceResponse.description: Response message contains the total available balance of the wallet.

walletName.description: The name of the queried wallet.

totalStake.description: The total stake amount in NanoPAC.

pactusGetTotalStakeResponse.description: Response message contains the total stake of the wallet.

blockHeight.description: The height of the block containing the transaction.

blockTime.description: The UNIX timestamp of the block containing the transaction.

pactusGetTransactionResponse.description: Response message contains details of a transaction.

txs.description: List of transactions currently in the pool.

pactusGetTxPoolContentResponse.description: Response message contains transactions in the transaction pool.

address.description: The validator address associated with the public key.

pactusGetValidatorAddressResponse.description: Response message containing the validator address corresponding to a public key.

pactusGetValidatorAddressesResponse.description: Response message contains list of validator addresses.

walletName.description: The name of the wallet to query.

network.description: The network the wallet is connected to (e.g., mainnet, testnet).

encrypted.description: Indicates if the wallet is encrypted.

uuid.description: A unique identifier of the wallet.

defaultFee.description: The default fee of the wallet.

transactionId.description: The transaction ID in hexadecimal format.

time.description: Unix timestamp of when the transaction was confirmed.

pactusHistoryInfo.description: HistoryInfo contains transaction history details for an address.

walletName.description: The name of the queried wallet.

data.description: List of all addresses in the wallet with their details.

walletName.description: The name of the loaded wallet.

messageSent.description: Number of sent bundles categorized by message type.

messageReceived.description: Number of received bundles categorized by message type.

pactusMetricInfo.description: MetricInfo contains metrics data regarding network activity.

recipients.description: The list of recipients with their amounts.

pactusPayloadBatchTransfer.description: Payload for a batch transfer transaction.

publicKey.description: The public key of the validator.

address.description: The validator address associated with the sortition proof.

amount.description: The amount to be transferred in NanoPAC.

pactusPayloadType.description:
Enumeration for different types of transaction payloads.

 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified payload type.
 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_TRANSFER: Transfer payload type.
 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_BOND: Bond payload type.
 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_SORTITION: Sortition payload type.
 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_UNBOND: Unbond payload type.
 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_WITHDRAW: Withdraw payload type.
 - PAYLOAD_TYPE_BATCH_TRANSFER: Batch transfer payload type.

validator.description: The address of the validator to unbond from.

validatorAddress.description: The address of the validator to withdraw from.

accountAddress.description: The address of the account to withdraw to.

status.description: Current status of the peer (e.g., connected, disconnected).

moniker.description: Moniker or Human-Readable name of the peer.

agent.description: Version and agent details of the peer.

peerId.description: Peer ID of the peer in P2P network.

consensusKeys.description: List of consensus keys used by the peer.

consensusAddresses.description: List of consensus addresses used by the peer.

services.description: Bitfield representing the services provided by the peer.

lastBlockHash.description: Hash of the last block the peer knows.

lastSent.description: Unix timestamp of the last bundle sent to the peer (UTC).

lastReceived.description: Unix timestamp of the last bundle received from the peer (UTC).

protocols.description: List of protocols supported by the peer.

totalSessions.description: Total download sessions with the peer.

completedSessions.description: Completed download sessions with the peer.

outboundHelloSent.description: Whether the hello message was sent from the outbound connection.

pactusPeerInfo.description: PeerInfo contains information about a peer in the network.

pactusPingResponse.description:
Response message for ping - intentionally empty for measuring round-trip time.

Empty response payload for measuring round-trip time

blockData.description: The block data of the proposal.

signature.description: The signature of the proposal, signed by the proposer.

pactusProposalInfo.description: Message contains information about a proposal.

publicKeys.description: List of BLS public keys to be aggregated.

pactusPublicKeyAggregationRequest.description: Request message for aggregating multiple BLS public keys.

address.description: The blockchain address derived from the aggregated public key.

pactusPublicKeyAggregationResponse.description: Response message contains the aggregated BLS public key result.

walletName.description: The name of the restored wallet.

pactusSetAddressLabelResponse.description: Response message for address label update.

privateKey.description: The private key to sign the message.

message.description: The message content to be signed.

pactusSignMessageWithPrivateKeyRequest.description: Request message for signing a message with a private key.

signature.description: The resulting signature in hexadecimal format.

pactusSignMessageWithPrivateKeyResponse.description: Response message contains the signature generated from the message.

transactionId.description: The ID of the signed transaction.

pactusSignRawTransactionResponse.description: Response message contains the transaction ID and signed raw transaction.

signatures.description: List of BLS signatures to be aggregated.

pactusSignatureAggregationRequest.description: Request message for aggregating multiple BLS signatures.

signature.description: The aggregated BLS signature in hexadecimal format.

pactusSignatureAggregationResponse.description: Response message contains the aggregated BLS signature.

id.description: The unique ID of the transaction.

data.description: The raw transaction data in hexadecimal format.

lockTime.description: The lock time for the transaction.

value.description: The value of the transaction in NanoPAC.

fee.description: The fee for the transaction in NanoPAC.

memo.description: A memo string for the transaction.

publicKey.description: The public key associated with the transaction.

pactusTransactionVerbosity.description:
Enumeration for verbosity levels when requesting transaction details.

 - TRANSACTION_VERBOSITY_DATA: Request transaction data only.
 - TRANSACTION_VERBOSITY_INFO: Request detailed transaction information.

walletName.description: The name of the unloaded wallet.

data.description: The serialized data of the validator.

publicKey.description: The public key of the validator.

number.description: The unique number assigned to the validator.

stake.description: The stake of the validator in NanoPAC.

lastBondingHeight.description: The height at which the validator last bonded.

lastSortitionHeight.description: The height at which the validator last participated in sortition.

unbondingHeight.description: The height at which the validator will unbond.

availabilityScore.description: The availability score of the validator.

protocolVersion.description: The protocol version of the validator.

pactusValidatorInfo.description: Message contains information about a validator.

message.description: The original message content that was signed.

signature.description: The signature to verify in hexadecimal format.

publicKey.description: The public key of the signer.

pactusVerifyMessageRequest.description: Request message for verifying a message signature.

isValid.description: Boolean indicating whether the signature is valid for the given message and public key.

pactusVerifyMessageResponse.description: Response message contains the verification result.

blockHash.description: The hash of the block being voted on.

round.description: The consensus round of the vote.

cpRound.description: The change-proposer round of the vote.

cpValue.description: The change-proposer value of the vote.

pactusVoteInfo.description: Message contains information about a vote.

pactusVoteType.description:
Enumeration for types of votes.

 - VOTE_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified vote type.
 - VOTE_TYPE_PREPARE: Prepare vote type.
 - VOTE_TYPE_PRECOMMIT: Precommit vote type.
 - VOTE_TYPE_CP_PRE_VOTE: Change-proposer:pre-vote vote type.
 - VOTE_TYPE_CP_MAIN_VOTE: Change-proposer:main-vote vote type.
 - VOTE_TYPE_CP_DECIDED: Change-proposer:decided vote type.

topic.description: The topic associated with the publisher.

hwm.description:
The high-water mark (HWM) for the publisher, indicating the
maximum number of messages to queue before dropping older ones.

pactusZMQPublisherInfo.description: ZMQPublisherInfo contains information about a ZeroMQ publisher.
